mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcp.dcp.dao.DCP002004EMapper.DCP002004EHisSelect */
SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,TO_CHAR(B.FRT_REGI_DH,'YYYYMMDD') AS DTB_DT ,B.DTB_DPT_CD ,( SELECT S1.DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = B.DTB_DPT_CD ) AS DTB_DPT_NM ,B.DTB_PEN_ID ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(B.DTB_PEN_ID,'2') AS DTB_PEN_NM ,F_CODE_NM('1000934', B.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD) AS CVPT_HNDL_STA_NM ,B.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,B.HNDL_DPT_CD ,( SELECT S1.DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = B.HNDL_DPT_CD ) AS HNDL_DPT_NM ,B.HNDL_CHGR_ID ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(B.HNDL_CHGR_ID,'2') AS HNDL_CHGR_NM ,B.RDTB_RQS_RSN ,B.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO ,B.BAI_CHGR_ID ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(B.BAI_CHGR_ID,'2') AS BAI_CHGR_NM FROM TBDCPDCP101M A ,TBDCPDCP202H B WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD IN ('6','9') AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND A.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #{cvptAcpNo} ORDER BY B.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ASC

/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcp.dcp.dao.DCP002004EMapper.DCP002005EMainSelect */
SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,CASE WHEN A.REQ_DVSN_CD = '9' THEN A.ACP_YR||'-이해-'||A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO ELSE A.ACP_YR||'-청금-'||A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO END AS ACP_NO ,F_CODE_NM('1000940',A.CVPT_KND_CD) AS CVPT_KND_NM ,F_CODE_NM('1000944',A.CVPT_KND_DTL_CD) AS CVPT_KND_DTL_NM ,A.CVPT_KND_DTL_CD ,A.CVPT_KND_CD ,( SELECT S1.DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = A.ACP_DPT_CD ) ||'/'||F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(A.RCEP_ID,'2') AS ACP_NM ,ACP_DPT_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.ACP_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ACP_DH ,A.ACP_RUT_CD ,F_CODE_NM('1000927',A.ACP_RUT_CD) AS ACP_RUT_NM ,F_CODE_NM('1000926',A.REQR_KND_CD) AS REQR_KND_NM ,DECODE(#{reqrKndCd},'1',A.CVPTR_NM,'2',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'3',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'4',A.CVPTR_NM) AS CVPTR_NM ,A.OPEN_YN ,DECODE(A.CVPT_WDW_DH,NULL,'N','Y') AS WIDW_YN ,DECODE(A.ZCD,NULL,'','(우)'||A.ZCD||' '||A.AD||' '||A.DTL_AD) AS AD ,A.TNB ,A.HPN ,CASE WHEN A.ACP_RUT_CD = '8' THEN F_CODE_NM('1000936',A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD) WHEN A.ACP_RUT_CD <> '8' AND A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD = '003' THEN F_CODE_NM('1000936',A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD) ELSE '홈페이지+'||F_CODE_NM('1000936',A.RSLT_NTF_WAY_CD) END AS RSLT_NTF_WAY_NM ,C.CLM_NM ,C.WRK_PLAC_NM ,C.TNB AS CLM_TNB ,DECODE(C.ZCD,NULL,'','(우)'||C.ZCD||' '||C.AD||' '||C.DTL_AD) AS CLM_AD ,B.CVPT_TXT ,D.HNDL_DPT_CD ,D.HNDL_CHGR_ID ,A.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ,A.DOC_ID ,A.TIT_NM ,A.SMG_CVPT_APL_NO ,A.SMG_FRT_CVPT_APL_GCC_ORG_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.CVPT_WDW_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CVPT_WDW_DH ,A.CVPT_WDW_RSN ,CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(FILE_ID) FROM UBKERAPP.ECM_FILE_LIST_VIEW2 X WHERE A.DOC_ID = X.DOC_ID ) > 0 THEN '첨부파일 있음' ELSE '첨부파일 없음' END AS ATCH_YN ,D.BAI_CHGR_ID ,D.HNDL_DPT_CD AS OLD_HNDL_DPT_CD ,NVL(A.INNER_YN,'N') AS INNER_YN ,A.INNER_ORG_NM FROM TBDCPDCP101M A ,TBDCPDCP102M B ,TBDCPDCP103M C ,TBDCPDCP201M D WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND A.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #{cvptAcpNo} AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = C.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND A.ACP_YR = C.ACP_YR(+) AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = C.CVPT_ACP_NO(+) AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = D.REQ_DVSN_CD(+) AND A.ACP_YR = D.ACP_YR(+) AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = D.CVPT_ACP_NO(+)

/* kr.go.bai.eip.DCP002005E.dcp.dao.DCP002004EMapper.DCP002005EDptSelect */
SELECT DPT_CD, DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE DPT_CD LIKE '0L0%' AND USE_YN ='Y' AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('0L0000')

/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcp.dcp.dao.DCP002004EMapper.DCP002005EUsrSelect */
SELECT USR_ID,USR_NAM ,CASE WHEN SUB_DPT_CD LIKE '0L0%' THEN SUB_DPT_CD ELSE DPT_CD END DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE (DPT_CD LIKE '0L0%' OR SUB_DPT_CD LIKE '0L0%') AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('0L0000') AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USR_NAM ASC

/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcp.dcp.dao.DCP002004EMapper.DCP002005EBaiUsrSelect */
SELECT USR_ID,USR_NAM ,CASE WHEN SUB_DPT_CD LIKE '0L0%' THEN SUB_DPT_CD ELSE DPT_CD END DPT_CD FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE (DPT_CD LIKE '0L0%' OR SUB_DPT_CD LIKE '0L0%') AND DPT_CD NOT IN ('0L0000') AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' AND CNB < '7000' ORDER BY USR_NAM ASC

/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcp.dcp.dao.DCP002004EMapper.DCP002010PUsrSelect */
SELECT RANK_NM_2 AS PST_NM,USR_NAM ,USR_ID FROM TBDCMACM001M WHERE (RAL_BLT_DIV_CD = CASE WHEN #{dptCd} LIKE '06%' THEN SUBSTR(#{dptCd},1,4)||'10' ELSE #{dptCd} END OR DPT_CD = #{dptCd} OR SUB_DPT_CD = #{dptCd}) AND RSG_DT IS NULL AND RQS_STA_CD = '3' AND BAI_USR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USR_NAM ASC

SELECT '대전사무소 : '||CNT1||', '||'광주사무소 : '||CNT2||', ' ||'부산사무소 : '||CNT3||', '||'서울센터 : '||CNT4||', ' ||'국민제안감사2국제1과 : '||CNT5||', '||'국민제안감사2국제2과 : '||CNT6||', ' ||'국민제안감사2국제3과 : '||CNT7 AS CNT , CNT1, CNT2, CNT3, CNT4, CNT5, CNT6, CNT7 ,(CNT1+ CNT2+ CNT3 + CNT4) as SUM_CNT ,(CNT1+ CNT2+ CNT3+ CNT4+ CNT5+ CNT6+ CNT7) AS TOTAL_CNT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dipDt}), 'MM') AS MM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dipDt}), 'DD') AS DD FROM (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062500' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062800' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062600' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '071110' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '0L0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '0L0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '0L0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT7 FROM TBDCPDCP101M D2 ,(SELECT * FROM TBDCPDCP202H D1 WHERE HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND (D1.REQ_DVSN_CD, D1.ACP_YR, D1.CVPT_ACP_NO,D1.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) IN (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO,MIN(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) FROM TBDCPDCP202H S1 WHERE S1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO) ) D1 WHERE D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = '6' AND D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D2.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D2.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO AND TO_CHAR(D1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{dipDt} AND D1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('0L0100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('0L0100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD = #{dptCd}
AND (D1.REQ_DVSN_CD, D1.ACP_YR, D1.CVPT_ACP_NO,D1.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) IN (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO,MIN(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) FROM TBDCPDCP202H S1 WHERE S1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD IN ('20','30') AND TO_CHAR(S1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{dipDt} AND S1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110','0L0100')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110','0L0100')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD = #{dptCd}
GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO) )

SELECT '대전사무소 : '||CNT1||', '||'광주사무소 : '||CNT2||', ' ||'부산사무소 : '||CNT3||', '||'서울센터 : '||CNT4||', ' ||'국민제안감사2국제1과 : '||CNT5||', '||'국민제안감사2국제2과 : '||CNT6||', ' ||'국민제안감사2국제3과 : '||CNT7 AS CNT , CNT1, CNT2, CNT3, CNT4, CNT5, CNT6, CNT7 ,(CNT1+ CNT2+ CNT3 + CNT4) as SUM_CNT ,(CNT1+ CNT2+ CNT3+ CNT4+ CNT5+ CNT6+ CNT7) AS TOTAL_CNT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dipDt}), 'MM') AS MM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dipDt}), 'DD') AS DD FROM (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062500' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062800' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '062600' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '071110' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '0L0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '0L0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN HNDL_DPT_CD = '0L0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT7 FROM TBDCPDCP101M D2 ,(SELECT * FROM TBDCPDCP202H D1 WHERE HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(D1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{dipDt} AND D1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND D1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD = '30' ) D1 WHERE D2.REQ_DVSN_CD ='6' AND D2.REQ_DVSN_CD = D1.REQ_DVSN_CD AND D2.ACP_YR = D1.ACP_YR AND D2.CVPT_ACP_NO = D1.CVPT_ACP_NO
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('0L0100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD IN ('0L0100','071110')
AND D2.ACP_DPT_CD = #{dptCd}
AND (D1.REQ_DVSN_CD, D1.ACP_YR, D1.CVPT_ACP_NO,D1.CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) IN (SELECT S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO,MAX(CVPT_DTB_HST_SRNO) FROM TBDCPDCP202H S1 WHERE S1.CVPT_HNDL_STA_CD ='30' AND TO_CHAR(S1.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{dipDt} AND S1.HNDL_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110','0L0100')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD IN ('071100','071110','0L0100')
AND S1.DTB_DPT_CD = #{dptCd}
GROUP BY S1.REQ_DVSN_CD, S1.ACP_YR, S1.CVPT_ACP_NO) )
mapper.insert:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP311Mapper.DCP002005ESmgInsert */
INSERT INTO T_IC_TARGET_SRC_INTERFACE ( INTERFACE_KEY ,APP_ORGAN_CODE /*최초 민원 신청 기관코드(GCC)*/ ,PETI_NO /*민원신청번호*/ ,REC_SEQ /*분류이력일련번호*/ ,CIVIL_NO /*민원접수번호*/ ,PETI_GUBUN /*민원구분 (500고정,담당자부서지정) */ ,CANCEL_STATUS /*민원취하여부(Default N)*/ ,PCD_DEPT /*GCC 부서코드 (접수부서코드)*/ ,PCD_DEPT_NM /*GCC 부서명 (접수부서명)*/ ,PCD_DUTY_ID /*접수자명*/ ,PCD_EMAIL /*접수 이메일 (대표이메일 사용, 감청국, 센터 로 분류)*/ ,PCD_TEL /*접수자 전화번호 (대표전화 사용: 감청국, 센터로 분류)*/ ,PCD_ORGAN_CODE /*실처리기관코드 (감사원 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,SRCORGCD /*소스기관코드 (감사원 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,TGTORGCD /*타겟기관코드 (신문고 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,WRITE_TIME /*등록일자*/ ,SND_RCV_GUBUN /*송수신구분 (1:송신, 2:수신)*/ ,SND_RCV_TIME /*송수신일자*/ ,SEND_YN /*송신여부 (N DEFAULT, EAI 가 송신후 Y로 변경함)*/ ) SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF2') || LPAD(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 999999999)), 9, '0') ,SMG_FRT_CVPT_APL_GCC_ORG_CD ,SMG_CVPT_APL_NO ,SMG_CAT_HST_SRNO ,SMG_CVPT_ACP_NO ,'500' ,'N' ,( SELECT SUBSTR(STND_DPT_CD,9,7) FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = #{hndlDptCd} ) ,( SELECT S2.ALL_ORG_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 ,TBCSPIIT006M S2 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = #{hndlDptCd} AND S2.GCC_ORG_CD = SUBSTR(S1.STND_DPT_CD,9,7) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(#{hndlChgrId},'2') ,'' ,'02-2011-2191' ,'1040000' ,'1040000' ,'1140100' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ,'1' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,'N' FROM TBDCPDCP101M WHERE REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND CVPT_ACP_NO = #{cvptAcpNo}

/* kr.go.bai.eip.dcp.dcp.dao.DCP002004EMapper.DCP002004EEMsgInsert */
INSERT INTO MSG_DATA ( MSG_SEQ , CUR_STATE , REQ_DATE , CALL_TO , CALL_FROM , SMS_TXT , MSG_TYPE , CONT_SEQ , USERDATA ) VALUES ( MSG_DATA_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 0 , SYSDATE , REPLACE(#{hpn},'-','') , NVL(( SELECT S1.TNB FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = #{hndlDptCd} ) ,'0220112191') , '' , 6 , #{contSeq} , #{reqDvsnCd}||#{acpYr}||#{cvptAcpNo} )
